Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 59th/Pulaski
ShortDescription: EB 59 59th/61st  buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, Pulaski, 63rd, Kedzie, and 59th due to, street blockage near 59th/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound A#59 59th/61st  buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, Pulaski, 63rd, Kedzie, and 59th due to, street blockage near 59th/Pulaski.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
